about_the_game:
Nusakana 2nd Anniversary artbook is a collection of an unpublished drawings and arts posted in various blogs and website during the development of the game from its start at 2013 to 2015. This is by no means a proper artbook with polished art, but rather more of a collection of various illustration by the game graphic designer, num, whether it is serious or parody in nature.

This release is to commemorate 2 year of Nusakana release.
detailed_description:
Nusakana 2nd Anniversary artbook is a collection of an unpublished drawings and arts posted in various blogs and website during the development of the game from its start at 2013 to 2015. This is by no means a proper artbook with polished art, but rather more of a collection of various illustration by the game graphic designer, num, whether it is serious or parody in nature.

This release is to commemorate 2 year of Nusakana release.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14 or higher
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: All Mac OS version
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

name: Nusakana - 2nd Anniversary Artbook
